Scattershot/Breakdown/Dark One:



Scattershot took off into the air after Stalker, following him, as was Dark 
One, Breakdown transforming to robot mode and chasing after.


Scattershot activated his boosters, landing 20 ft in front of Stalker, firing 
off 14 armor-piercing rounds from his automatic rifle at Stalker's knees.

---

Dark One fired off 16 explosive rounds at Stalker's back.
